thread.title: Ground News - After the flood, the rainbow; in some places, times two
thread.title_full: Ground News - After the flood, the rainbow; in some places, times two

author: Universal Hub
title: Ground News - After the flood, the rainbow; in some places, times two
text: After the flood, the rainbow; in some places, times two After the overnight torrents, we got another mini-torrent this afternoon, followed by a rainbow that water-weary Bostonians rushed out to see. Danny in Boston shows us the double rainbow over Uphams Corner in Dorchester. Paul Kafsis watched it over the bocce courts and ball fields along the inner harbor in the North End: On the other side of the harbor, Chris Briggs was among the people who had a good look even as they stayed dry at a Logan res… Summary by Universal Hub 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] Universal Hub After the flood, the rainbow; in some places, times two After the overnight torrents, we got another mini-torrent this afternoon, followed by a rainbow that water-weary Bostonians rushed out to see. Danny in Boston shows us the double rainbow over Uphams Corner in Dorchester.
